Reviews.Title: Sold my Nikon D80 for D3200 and glad I did!
Reviews.Author: Kesha
Reviews.Content: Love, Love, Love everything. Just what I was looking for!!! It's lighter than my Nikon D80...has everything I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: CRAIG A HAHNEL
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter for Christmas. She loved it and uses it daily. I would recommend to anyone as a starter camera.

Reviews.Title: thank you,,
Reviews.Author: Raju
Reviews.Content: thanks for this great deal many buyed this camera, but i got a great deal with this purchase ,,thank you,,

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Marcio
Reviews.Content: Thats an amazing product. Also the accessories are very handful! Very good price and lots of items to improve the photo experience!
